lyrics:
Now, Here comes the music

Okay, all you need is some patience
And a little practice
And you'll soon be disco dancing with the best
Let's start with the basic two-beat turn
I'll count it for you like this
Step left, around, and together with the right
Step left, around, and together with the right

Act like the end of a record and fade out
All that childish stuff is just played out
Kill the noise and the instruction
Now's the time for a brief introduction
Feed me the beat
Glad to meet ya
Fancy moves and steps how I greet ya
Side to side, jump, step and turn
Set the fire boys and let's burn

Step left, around, and together with the right
Stand straight then lean brush tips
Step left, around, and together with the right
Step forward dip step right and back

Stop the drumming
You're a distraction
You can chill but I'm not relaxing
I come here to turn up the party
Socialize and Coke and Bacardi
Drop my drink and flee to the dance floor
Show the DJ what I came here for
Lose control, just like a wild animal
Eat the beat like a hungry cannibal

Dance do-do-do-do-doo

Dance do-do-do-do-doo
Show me how to dance
Dance do-do-do-do-doo

Dance do-do-do-do-doo
Show me how to dance

Ready, set and begin
Step left, around, and together with the right
Stand straight then lean brush tips

Step left, around, and together with the right
Step forward dip step right and back

Show you how to dance
It's like sex
Start up dry and end up all wet
From the moves, and all of the action
The result is pure satisfaction
Music pumps, your partner is ready
Keep the beat and you move steady
I'm here to show you how
Hit the floor and dance now

Step left, around, and together with the right
Stand straight then lean brush tips
Step left, around, and together with the right
Step forward dip step right and back

Dance do-do-do-do-doo

Dance do-do-do-do-doo
Show me how to dance
Dance do-do-do-do-doo

Dance do-do-do-do-doo
Show me how to dance

Get on your feet
And dance to the beat and
Dance, dance, dance, dance
Dance, dance, dance, dance
Dance, d-d-d-d-dance
People come along
Dance
Get down to this funky song
Dance, d-d-d-d-dance
Feel the rhythm, stomp your feet

Dance
Now check it out, man

Dance do-do-do-do-doo

Dance do-do-do-do-doo
Show me how to dance
Dance do-do-do-do-doo

Dance do-do-do-do-doo
Show me how to dance

Well, that's it
Good luck
And keep on dancing
